allowToTransferMyMoney: I allow friendly Carrier to transfer my money to the cloud
cannotDeleteAccount:
Note that you cannot delete account
 if you have a running order
carrierComesToTheCountryToReceiver: Carrier brings the good to the country where Receiver lives. Then if Receiver sees that the good is suitable for him, he proves it in the app, and Carrier gets his money.
carrierWaitingYourConfirmation: The Carrier is waiting for your confirmation to start the deal
companyThatUnitesPeopleETC:
Company that unites people all over the world. If you need anything what you
 don’t have in your country, just ask another person to carry it to you in our app
confirmationCarrier: Waiting for confirmation of the Carrier
confirmationReceiver: Waiting for confirmation of the Receiver
errorAddOrder: Error when trying to add an order
errorApplyToOrder: Error when trying to apply to an order
errorSignIn: Error when trying to sign in
errorSignUp: Error when trying to sign up
errorToResetPassword: Error when trying to reset the password
errorUpdateAvatar: Error while trying to update avatar
errorUpdated: Error when trying to update user
errorUpdatePassword: Error when trying to change the password
haveSomeProblems: Have some problems? Write to our support
highlightedFieldsHaveBeenChanged: Highlighted fields have been changed and are waiting for your confirmation
highlightedFieldsHaveBeenChangedByYou: Highlighted fields have been changed by you and are waiting for confirmation
holdMoney: We hold it on our servers. Carrier buys a good himself, after he sees that the sum is in the cloud
ifYouAreInTheCountry: If you are in a country where you don't have something you need, you can request it and wait for the Carrier's respond or respond to the Carrier's offer yourself.
ifYouWantToVisitAnotherCountry: If you want to visit another country,you can deliver goods to the country you are going to for people who need something. By completing orders, you earn money.
linkWasSentToEmail: Link to reset your password was sent to
maxWeightInput: Weight should not be more than 40 kg
mustBeYears: You must be at least 18 years
name: Name
oneIfYouCarrier: If you are a Carrier, you need to choose a Receiver to deliver a good
oneIfYouReceiver: If you are a Receiver, than you need to choose Carrier, who will buy you a good you need.
passErrorUpdated: Error when trying to update password
previousPassword: The new password must not be the same as the previous one
priceSum: Carrier points the price of good, then to the result sum added our commission and profit for Carrier. Receiver pays the sum.
receiveNotifications:
I would like to receive notifications about the news of a Friendly Carrier
 by email
receiveNotificationsAboutChangingOrder: I would like to receive notifications about changing order status
receiveNotificationsAboutOtherUsers: I would like to receive notifications about other users' messages
receiverWaitingYourConfirmation: The Receiver is waiting for your confirmation to start the deal
successRespondedOrder: You have successfully responded to the order.
theRecipientPaysForThePackage: The Receiver pays for the package and we hold the entire amount in our account until the Receiver confirms they received the item. After that we send the money to the Carrier.
toCreateAnOrderYouCanClick: To create an order, use the buttons below
transferTheAmountByPhoneNumberTo: Transfer the amount by phone number to
userHaveNoOrdersYet: User don't have any orders yet
userHaveNoReviewsYet: User don't have any reviews yet
useTwoStepAuthentication: I want to use two-step authentication by phone number
weChargeACommissionFor: We charge a commission for finding a Carrier/Receiver for you, but the price will be low.
youHaveNoOrdersYet: You don't have any orders yet.
yourAllDataWillBe: All your data will be confident. Your money will be safe.
